text: Pat and Mike is a 1952 American romantic comedy movie directed by George Cukor and starring Spencer Tracy, Katherine Hepburn, Aldo Ray, William Ching, Sammy White, George Mathews, Loring Smith, Frank Richards. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1953. Hepburn was nominated in the Best Actress category at the 10th Golden Globe Awards, while Ray was nominated for "New Star of the Year". ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1952 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by George Cukor Category:Movies set in Colorado Category:Golf movies
title: Pat and Mike
